data.title: Charlotte Ross
data.text:
Born: 21-Jan-1968

Birthplace: Winnetka, IL

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Det. McDowell on NYPD Blue

Father: Peter Ross (financial advisor)

Mother: Debbie

Brother: George (younger)

Husband: Michael Goldman (m. 18-Oct-2002, one son)

Son: Maxwell Ross Goldman (b. 23-Mar-2004)

High School: New Trier High School, Winnetka, IL

TELEVISION

Glee Judy Fabray (2009-12)

Jake in Progress Annie (2006)

NYPD Blue Det. Connie McDowell (2001-04)

Beggars and Choosers Lori Volpone (1999-2001)

The 5 Mrs. Buchanans Bree Buchanan (1994-95)

The Heights Hope Linden (1992)

Days of Our Lives Eve Donovan (1987-91)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Street Kings 2: Motor City (19-Apr-2011) · Beth Kingston

Drive Angry (24-Feb-2011) · Candy

Live! (28-Apr-2007) · Jennifer

Moola (20-Apr-2007)

Montana Sky (5-Feb-2007)

Kidnapped in Paradise (26-May-1999)

Looking for Lola (1998) · Debbie

Fall Into Darkness (25-Nov-1996)

Love and a .45 (10-Sep-1994) · Mary Ann

Foreign Student (20-Apr-1994)

Touch and Go (22-Aug-1986)
